ActAeronautics Act
SubjectCanadian Aviation Security Regulations, 2012
PrecisCANADIAN AVIATION SECURITY REGULATIONS, 2012 in order to enhance harmonization of Canada’s regulatory framework with international standards, and respond, as appropriate, to industry concerns, as well as recommendations from independent analysis.
